name: Elemental (itch) (JP_Dizon)
description:
Follow the adventure through Mount Elemental! Be creative and precise in this action platformer. Overcome obstacles, battle elementals, unlock abilities, and conquer Mount Elemental.

Roman lives in a world where going on adventures is commonplace. Being the only one in his friend group who has not made a major accomplishment in an adventure, Roman is determined to change this fact. 

Reaching the summit of Mount Elemental is feared for being the most treacherous and daunting challenge for any adventurer. As Roman approaches the mountain, his body no longer feels like his own. Help Roman survive his journey to the top of Mount Elemental.

TIP: Don't hold space when dashing to a wall and make sure to read the signs!

CONTROLS

A | D - Left | Right

SPACE - Jump

S - Down

J - Attack

K - Dash

L - Fireball

Made for Hunter College Course MEDP 370, using P5.JS
